T02TD1796E:3a-18: zhal gsum phyag drug lta bur ni //
T02TD1796E:3a-19: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bsam //

T02TD1796E:3a-21: zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can //

T02TD1796E:3a-51: rim pa ji bzhin yang dag bsam //

T02TD1796E:4a-31: sngags pas snying gar rnam par dgod //

T02TD1796E:4a-33: tshor ba'i phung po'i ngo bo nyid //

T02TD1796E:4a-36: rkang pa gnyis la yi ge h'a //

T02TD1796E:4a-55: yi ge mee ni rtsar bzhag ste//
T02TD1796E:4b-0: @4b byams pa nyid du yongs su brtag / tshigs kun la ni sam bkod de //

T02TD1796E:4b-36: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1796E:4b-37: rdo rje sku ni mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1796E:4b-38: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1796E:4b-39: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1796E:4b-40: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1796E:4b-41: rdo rje sku ni mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1796E:4b-42: spyan dang lhan cig ldan pa yi //
T02TD1796E:4b-43: rnam par snang mdzad bsams nas su //
T02TD1796E:4b-44: de bcug nas ni byin brlabs te //
T02TD1796E:4b-45: sku yi byin gyis brlab pa brtsam //
T02TD1796E:4b-46: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin //
T02TD1796E:4b-47: phung po lnga yis rab gang ba //
T02TD1796E:4b-48: sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis //
T02TD1796E:4b-49: bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1796E:4b-50: a'a: ni kha dog dmar ldan pas //
T02TD1796E:5a-2: gos dkar zhes bya nam mkha' ru //
T02TD1796E:5a-3: spros nas nam mkha'i khams rnams dgang //
T02TD1796E:5a-4: gsung gi rdo rje'i sngags pa ni //
T02TD1796E:5a-5: nam mkha'i dbus na bzhugs pa la //
T02TD1796E:5a-6: de nas sngags pas tshig bcad 'di //
T02TD1796E:5a-7: gnyis brjod nas gsol ba gdab /
T02TD1796E:5a-8: chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1796E:5a-9: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1796E:5a-10: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1796E:5a-11: rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1796E:5a-12: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1796E:5a-13: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1796E:5a-14: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1796E:5a-15: rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1796E:5a-16: gos dkar mo dang lhan cig nyid //
T02TD1796E:5a-17: rang gi gtso bor yang dag ldan //
T02TD1796E:5a-18: lce la zhugs par rab bsams te //
T02TD1796E:5a-19: gsung gi byin gyis brlab pa brtsam //
T02TD1796E:5a-20: rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin //
T02TD1796E:5a-21: nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1796E:5a-22: bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra zhing //
T02TD1796E:5a-23: chos 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar shog / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1796E:5a-24: sngags pas snying gar nyi ma yi //
T02TD1796E:5a-25: gzugs brnyan 'bar ba bsam bya ste //
T02TD1796E:5a-26: der ni mthing shun lta bu yi //
T02TD1796E:5a-27: 'od zer lngar ldan h'um dgod do //
T02TD1796E:5a-28: de las lha mo m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1796E:5a-29: tshogs dang bcas pa dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1796E:5a-30: de bzhin thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom //
T02TD1796E:5a-31: de la sngon bzhin gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1796E:5a-32: dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba //
T02TD1796E:5a-33: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1796E:5a-34: ding bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1796E:5a-35: rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1796E:5a-36: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1796E:5a-37: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1796E:5a-38: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1796E:5a-39: rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1796E:5a-40: m'a ma k'i tshogs ma lus pa //
T02TD1796E:5a-41: rdo rje thugs dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1796E:5a-42: snying gar yang ni bcug nas su //
T02TD1796E:5a-43: thugs kyi byin gyis brlab pa brtsam //
T02TD1796E:5a-44: kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin//
T02TD1796E:5a-45: gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa //
T02TD1796E:5a-46: bdag kyang de dang 'dra gyur cig / rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs par shog / aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1796E:5a-47: de ltar rigs gsum dbye ba yis //
T02TD1796E:5a-48: so sor byin gyis brlabs nas ni //
T02TD1796E:5a-49: blo dang ldan pas gsang sngags 'dis //
T02TD1796E:5b-0: slar yang @5b thams cad bdag nyid bya //
T02TD1796E:5b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1796E:5b-2: de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1796E:5b-3: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
T02TD1796E:5b-4: mtshan ma drug dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1796E:5b-5: dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
T02TD1796E:5b-6: snying ga'i dbus su phra mo yi ;
T02TD1796E:5b-7: / ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1796E:5b-8: ting 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i //
T02TD1796E:5b-9: yi ge h'um ni de ru dgod //
T02TD1796E:5b-10: sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can //
T02TD1796E:5b-11: de ltar sbyor ba cher bskyed nas //
T02TD1796E:5b-12: cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02TD1796E:5b-13: sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya //
T02TD1796E:5b-14: gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni //
T02TD1796E:5b-15: sme sha can ni bdag nyid che //
T02TD1796E:5b-16: bu mo autpala mthing ga'i mdog / mig yangs dam pa rnyed nas ni //
T02TD1796E:5b-17: mnyam par bzhag cing legs par bslab //
T02TD1796E:5b-18: sgrub pa po la shin tu mos //
T02TD1796E:5b-19: aom ni spyi bor bsam par bya //
T02TD1796E:5b-20: a'a: ni ngag gi lam la dgod //
T02TD1796E:5b-21: h'um ni snying gar bsam bya zhing //
T02TD1796E:5b-22: lte bar sv'a dang rkang gnyis h'a //
T02TD1796E:5b-23: spyan dang m'a ma k'i dang ni //
T02TD1796E:5b-24: de bzhin du ni gos dkar mo //
T02TD1796E:5b-25: sgrol ma yang ni sngags pa yis //
T02TD1796E:5b-26: sa la sogs la rnam par dgod //
T02TD1796E:5b-27: lha mo rdo rje gzugs la sogs //
T02TD1796E:5b-28: de nyid la ni rnam bsams la //
T02TD1796E:5b-29: sa snying la sogs de rnams dang //
T02TD1796E:5b-30: snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya //
T02TD1796E:5b-31: lag g-yas rdo rje ro langs ma //
T02TD1796E:5b-32: g-yon la gzhan gyi mi thub ma //
T02TD1796E:5b-33: de yi khar ni khro gnyer ma //
T02TD1796E:5b-34: gsang bar ral pa gcig ma'o //
T02TD1796E:5b-35: gzhan yang dpung pa g-yas par ni //
T02TD1796E:5b-36: de bzhin gshegs yum rdo rje ma //
T02TD1796E:5b-37: g-yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi //
T02TD1796E:5b-38: phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1796E:5b-39: pus mo g-yas la gnas par yang //
T02TD1796E:5b-40: sna tshogs padma de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1796E:5b-41: g-yon pa la ni sna tshogs las //
T02TD1796E:5b-42: spyi bor nam mkha'i rdo rje ma //
T02TD1796E:5b-43: rkang pa gnyis la sa yi ni //
T02TD1796E:5b-44: sa 'dzin lha mo gzhag par bya //
T02TD1796E:5b-46: rdo rje padma yang dag brtsam //
T02TD1796E:5b-47: h'um gi sngags skyes rdo rje ni //
T02TD1796E:5b-48: rtse mo mnga' ba bsam par bya //
T02TD1796E:5b-49: de tshe de yi rtse dbus su //
T02TD1796E:5b-50: aom ni rnam par bsam par bya //
T02TD1796E:5b-51: de bzhin aa las byung ba yi //
T02TD1796E:5b-53: 'od zer lnga yis khyab bsams la //
T02TD1796E:6a-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1796E:6a-3: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal legs 'chang ste //
T02TD1796E:6a-4: h'um gi glu yis kyang ni bskyod bya zhing //
T02TD1796E:6a-5: rang gi byang chub sems nyid phyung ba'i tshe //
T02TD1796E:6a-6: des ni phat kyi gsang sngags brjod par bya //
T02TD1796E:6a-7: phyung nas slar yang sngags pas ni //
T02TD1796E:6a-8: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1796E:6a-9: byang chub sems kyis mchod nas ni //
T02TD1796E:6a-10: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1796E:6a-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'tma ko& ham /
T02TD1796E:6a-12: rang sngags yi ge las dbyung ba //
T02TD1796E:6a-13: rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs bdag /
T02TD1796E:6a-14: padma'i dbus su bskyed nas ni //
T02TD1796E:6a-15: slar yang zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur //
T02TD1796E:6a-16: badzra dhri ka sngags kyis dbyung ba //
T02TD1796E:6a-17: mi bskyod rdo rje bsam pa yang //
T02TD1796E:6a-18: mgon po ral pa thor tshugs can //
T02TD1796E:6a-19: mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas //
T02TD1796E:6a-20: mthing shun bzang po'i mdog ltar snang //
T02TD1796E:6a-21: sngo nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:6a-22: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD1796E:6a-23: phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1796E:6a-25: g-yas pa'i phyag tu bsam bya zhing //
T02TD1796E:6a-26: dril bu rin chen ral gri ni //
T02TD1796E:6a-27: de yi g-yon la bsam par bya //
T02TD1796E:6a-28: 'di ni thugs ka las byung nas //
T02TD1796E:6a-29: phyogs bcu rnams su gzigs nas ni //
T02TD1796E:6a-30: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02TD1796E:6a-31: sangs rgyas mdzad pa kun mdzad de //
T02TD1796E:6a-32: sems can ma lus kun sbyangs nas //
T02TD1796E:6a-33: zhe sdang rdo rje gnas la 'jog / slar byon rdo rje mgon po yi //
T02TD1796E:6a-35: sngags pas de yi snying ga ru //
T02TD1796E:6a-36: rjes zhugs bdag nyid rnam bsgoms pas //
T02TD1796E:6a-37: snga ma'i gzugs ni yongs gyur nas //
T02TD1796E:6a-38: zhe sdang rdo rje gnas su zhugs //
T02TD1796E:6a-40: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs //
T02TD1796E:6a-41: dpa' bo rang gi phyag rgyas 'khyud //
T02TD1796E:6a-42: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1796E:6a-43: drag po zhi dang 'dod chags che //
T02TD1796E:6a-44: zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes //
T02TD1796E:6a-45: zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD1796E:6a-46: dkyil 'khor thams cad spro bar mdzad //
T02TD1796E:6a-47: dzi na dzi ka sngags kyis dbyung ba //
T02TD1796E:6a-48: gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad dbyung //
T02TD1796E:6a-49: mi bskyod pa ni dbu rgyan byas //
T02TD1796E:6a-50: ston ka'i zla zer ltar snang zhing //
T02TD1796E:6b-0: thor tshugs @6b cod pan dag gis brgyan //
T02TD1796E:6b-1: dkar dang nag dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:6b-2: phyag drug zhi ba'i gzugs can te //
T02TD1796E:6b-3: 'khor lo rdo rje padma dag / g-yas pa la ni rnam par bsam //
T02TD1796E:6b-4: dril bu rin chen ral gri ni //
T02TD1796E:6b-5: 'di yi g-yon du rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1796E:6b-6: de bzhin thugs ka las byung ste //
T02TD1796E:6b-7: gti mug spyod nas sems can rnams //
T02TD1796E:6b-8: yang dag sbyangs te slar byon nas //
T02TD1796E:6b-9: shar phyogs kyi ni zla bar bzhugs //
T02TD1796E:6b-10: ratna dhri ka sngags kyis dbyung ba //
T02TD1796E:6b-11: rin chen tog ni sngags pas dbyung //
T02TD1796E:6b-12: zhi ba'i thor tshugs cod pan 'chang //
T02TD1796E:6b-13: mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas //
T02TD1796E:6b-14: ser dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:6b-15: phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1796E:6b-16: yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang //
T02TD1796E:6b-17: 'khor lo de yi g-yas su bsgom //
T02TD1796E:6b-18: dril bu padma ser po dang //
T02TD1796E:6b-19: ral gri g-yon du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1796E:6b-20: de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste //
T02TD1796E:6b-21: nga rgyal gnas la gnas pa rnams //
T02TD1796E:6b-22: yang dag sbyangs nas lho yi char //
T02TD1796E:6b-23: rin chen dbus su bzhugs par gsungs //
T02TD1796E:6b-24: a'a ro lam ka sngags kyis dbyung ba //
T02TD1796E:6b-25: mtha' yas rdo rje can dbyung ste //
T02TD1796E:6b-27: mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas //
T02TD1796E:6b-28: mgon po ral pa thor tshugs can //
T02TD1796E:6b-29: dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:6b-30: sgeg pa'i nyams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1796E:6b-31: phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1796E:6b-32: g-yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu dang //
T02TD1796E:6b-34: padma thugs ka'i phyogs gnas pa //
T02TD1796E:6b-35: g-yas pa yis ni 'byed par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:6b-36: rdo rje 'khor lo g-yas gnyis la //
T02TD1796E:6b-37: rin chen ral gri g-yon gnyis la //
T02TD1796E:6b-38: sngon bzhin 'dod chags can sbyangs nas //
T02TD1796E:6b-40: pradzny'a dhri ka sngags kyis dbyung ba //
T02TD1796E:6b-41: sngags pas don yod rdo rje can //
T02TD1796E:6b-42: mgon po sku mdog ljang gur dbyung //
T02TD1796E:6b-43: mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas //
T02TD1796E:6b-44: thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgya na //
T02TD1796E:6b-45: ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:6b-47: ral gri sna tshogs rdo rje dang //
T02TD1796E:6b-48: 'khor lo g-yas su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1796E:6b-49: phyag g-yon na ni dril bu dang //
T02TD1796E:6b-50: de bzhin pad ljang nor bu'o //
T02TD1796E:7a-2: rnam par sbyangs nas slar byon te //
T02TD1796E:7a-3: de bzhin byang gi phyogs su ni //
T02TD1796E:7a-4: sna tshogs rdo rje dag la bzhugs //
T02TD1796E:7a-5: zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags //
T02TD1796E:7a-6: yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste //
T02TD1796E:7a-7: rigs ni lnga po 'di dag nyid //
T02TD1796E:7a-8: 'dod dang thar par rab sgrub pa'o /
T02TD1796E:7a-9: mo ha ra ti sngags kyis dbyung //
T02TD1796E:7a-10: lha mo spyan ni dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1796E:7a-11: dkar zhing zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan //
T02TD1796E:7a-12: rnam snang mdzad kyis spyi bor mtshan //
T02TD1796E:7a-13: dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:7a-14: phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1796E:7a-15: 'khor lo rdo rje de bzhin du //
T02TD1796E:7a-16: autpala dkar po g-yas su bsam //
T02TD1796E:7a-17: dril bu de bzhin rin chen dang //
T02TD1796E:7a-18: ral gri g-yon du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1796E:7a-19: de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste //
T02TD1796E:7a-20: phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni //
T02TD1796E:7a-21: gdon dang nad gdungs 'jigs pa rnams //
T02TD1796E:7a-22: thugs rje chen pos zhi mdzad de //
T02TD1796E:7a-23: s'a ra byon nas ni zla dkyil du //
T02TD1796E:7a-24: shar gyi mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1796E:7a-25: dve sha ra ti'i sngags kyis dbyung //
T02TD1796E:7a-26: lha mo m'a ma k'i dbyung ste //
T02TD1796E:7a-28: bzhin bzangs shin tu yid du 'ong //
T02TD1796E:7a-29: gnag dang dkar dang dmar pa ste //
T02TD1796E:7a-30: mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas //
T02TD1796E:7a-31: 'khor lo rdo rje de bzhin du //
T02TD1796E:7a-32: autpala sngo dmar g-yas pa la //
T02TD1796E:7a-33: dril bu rin chen ral gri ni //
T02TD1796E:7a-34: g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:7a-35: bgegs chen 'jigs pas gzir ba rnams //
T02TD1796E:7a-36: thugs rje chen pos srung bar mdzad //
T02TD1796E:7a-37: byung nas slar ni byon nas su //
T02TD1796E:7a-38: lho nub tu ni bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1796E:7a-39: r'a ga ra ti'i sngags kyis dbyung //
T02TD1796E:7a-40: gos dkar mo ni dbyung bya ste //
T02TD1796E:7a-41: zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar //
T02TD1796E:7a-43: 'od dpag med bcas ral pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1796E:7a-44: phyag drug pa ni rnam bsgoms te //
T02TD1796E:7a-45: g-yon pa dril bur bcas pa yis //
T02TD1796E:7a-48: dmar po g-yas kyis 'byed par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:7a-49: rdo rje 'khor lo g-yas dag la //
T02TD1796E:7a-50: nor bu rin chen ral gri g-yon //
T02TD1796E:7a-51: bsnams par mdzad pa phyung nas ni //
T02TD1796E:7a-52: gdon gyis nyen pa zhes mdzad de //
T02TD1796E:7a-53: slar byon padma'i dbus nyid du //
T02TD1796E:7b-0: nub byang mtshams su bzhugs par @7b 'gyur //
T02TD1796E:7b-1: badzra ra ti'i sngags kyis dbyung //
T02TD1796E:7b-2: yid 'ong sgrol ma dbyung bya ste //
T02TD1796E:7b-3: ljang dang gnag dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:7b-4: d'ur ba'i lo ma'i mdangs dang ldan //
T02TD1796E:7b-5: don yod pas ni gtsug tor byas //
T02TD1796E:7b-6: phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1796E:7b-7: sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1796E:7b-8: autpala dkar po g-yas pa na //
T02TD1796E:7b-9: dril bu rin chen ral gri ni //
T02TD1796E:7b-10: brtul zhugs can gyis g-yon du bsam //
T02TD1796E:7b-11: sems can thams cad dbang mdzad de //
T02TD1796E:7b-12: sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan la yang //
T02TD1796E:7b-13: byung nas slar ni byon nas su //
T02TD1796E:7b-14: byang shar mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD1796E:7b-15: rnal 'byor pas ni rim gnyis par //
T02TD1796E:7b-16: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa dbyung //
T02TD1796E:7b-17: me yi mtshams su dgod bya ba //
T02TD1796E:7b-18: rdo rje gzugs ni yid 'ong ba //
T02TD1796E:7b-19: zhal gsum phyag drug dkar ba ste //
T02TD1796E:7b-20: dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal //
T02TD1796E:7b-21: gnyis kyis me long 'dzin mdzad de //
T02TD1796E:7b-22: lhag ma gti mug dag dang mtshungs //
T02TD1796E:7b-23: bden bral phyogs dgod lha mo ni //
T02TD1796E:7b-24: rdo rje sgra ste phyag drug ma //
T02TD1796E:7b-25: zhal gsum sku mdog ser mo ste //
T02TD1796E:7b-26: dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan yin //
T02TD1796E:7b-27: phyag gnyis kyis ni bi wang bsnams //
T02TD1796E:7b-28: lhag ma m'a ma k'i dang mtshungs //
T02TD1796E:7b-29: rlung gi phyogs dgod lha mo ni //
T02TD1796E:7b-30: rdo rje dri ste phyag drug ma //
T02TD1796E:7b-31: zhal gsum sku mdog dmar mo ste //
T02TD1796E:7b-32: snang mtha' yas kyi thor tshugs can //
T02TD1796E:7b-33: phyag gnyis kyis ni dung bsnams te //
T02TD1796E:7b-34: lhag ma gos dkar can dang mtshungs //
T02TD1796E:7b-35: dbang ldan phyogs dgod lha mo ni //
T02TD1796E:7b-36: rdo rje ro ste phyag drug ma //
T02TD1796E:7b-37: zhal gsum sku mdog ljang gu ste //
T02TD1796E:7b-38: dbu rgyan la ni rda sgra bzhugs //
T02TD1796E:7b-39: phyag gnyis la ni ro yi snod //
T02TD1796E:7b-40: lhag ma sgrol ma lta bu yin //
T02TD1796E:7b-41: rdo rje sems dpa' legs 'khyud de //
T02TD1796E:7b-42: 'khor lo'i dbus na rab bzhugs par //
T02TD1796E:7b-43: rdo rje reg bya bsam bya ste //
T02TD1796E:7b-44: zhal sogs bdag po lta bu'o //
T02TD1796E:7b-45: rim pa gsum pa shar gyi ni //
T02TD1796E:7b-46: snam bur brtul zhugs can gyis dbyung //
T02TD1796E:7b-47: meem thlim sa bon las byung ba //
T02TD1796E:7b-48: byams pa sa yi snying po gnyis //
T02TD1796E:7b-49: aom gyi sa bon las byung ba //
T02TD1796E:7b-50: phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po //
T02TD1796E:7b-51: lho yi phyogs kyi snam bu la //
T02TD1796E:7b-52: go rims bzhin du dgod par bya //
T02TD1796E:7b-53: aom dang h'um las yang dag byung //
T02TD1796E:8a-2: 'di dag nub tu dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1796E:8a-3: byang gi phyogs su dbyung ba ni //
T02TD1796E:8a-4: aom dang sam ki sa bon skyes //
T02TD1796E:8a-5: sgrib sel kun du dbang por bcas //
T02TD1796E:8a-6: 'di dag dbu rgyan rang gi mgon //
T02TD1796E:8a-7: sku mdog sogs pa de dang mtshungs //
T02TD1796E:8a-8: phyag dang mtshon cha dag kyang ni //
T02TD1796E:8a-9: rang rang gi ni bdag bor mtshungs //
T02TD1796E:8a-10: byams pa 'ba' zhig g-yas pa na //
T02TD1796E:8a-11: klu shing me tog bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:8a-12: 'di dag skye mched rnam sbyangs shing //
T02TD1796E:8a-13: lha yi mig sogs stsol ba po //
T02TD1796E:8a-14: sems can skye mched sbyangs nas su //
T02TD1796E:8a-15: slar byon nas ni stan la bzhugs //
T02TD1796E:8a-16: ya m'anta kri ta sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1796E:8a-17: sngags pas gshin rje gshed dbyung ba //
T02TD1796E:8a-18: rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1796E:8a-19: zhal ni gnag dang dkar dang dmar //
T02TD1796E:8a-21: dbyug pa rdo rje 'khor lo rnams //
T02TD1796E:8a-22: phyag g-yas na ni bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:8a-23: thugs kar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1796E:8a-24: dril bu dgra sta g-yon pa na //
T02TD1796E:8a-25: g-yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis //
T02TD1796E:8a-26: dbang po la sogs tshogs bcas dang //
T02TD1796E:8a-27: mi bzad bgegs kyang skrag par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:8a-28: padma nyi ma mnan nas ni //
T02TD1796E:8a-29: shar gyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1796E:8a-30: pradzny'a na kri ta sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1796E:8a-31: rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1796E:8a-32: sku mdog dkar zhing nor bus brgyan //
T02TD1796E:8a-33: gzhan gyis mi thub sngags kyis dbyung //
T02TD1796E:8a-34: gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1796E:8a-35: dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:8a-36: mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur //
T02TD1796E:8a-38: rdo rje dbyug pa ral gri ni ;
T02TD1796E:8a-39: / g-yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:8a-40: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1796E:8a-41: dril bu dgra sta g-yon pa na //
T02TD1796E:8a-42: g-yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis //
T02TD1796E:8a-43: mi bzad bgegs ni skrag par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:8a-44: padma nyi ma mnan nas ni //
T02TD1796E:8a-45: lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1796E:8a-46: padm'a nta kri ta sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1796E:8a-47: brtul zhugs can gyis rta mgrin dbyung //
T02TD1796E:8a-48: spyan gsum padma r'a ga'i mdog / zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar //
T02TD1796E:8a-49: zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba dang //
T02TD1796E:8a-50: 'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can //
T02TD1796E:8a-51: dpa' bo g-yon brkyang ba yis gnas //
T02TD1796E:8b-1: padma ral gri gtun shing ni //
T02TD1796E:8b-2: g-yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:8b-3: bsnyems dang bcas pas dril bu dang //
T02TD1796E:8b-4: dgra sta zhags pa g-yon na bsnams //
T02TD1796E:8b-5: padma nyi ma la gnas te //
T02TD1796E:8b-6: phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni //
T02TD1796E:8b-7: klu rnams skrag par mdzad nas su //
T02TD1796E:8b-8: nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD1796E:8b-9: bighn'a nta krita sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1796E:8b-10: rnga sgra'i cod pan yang dag ldan //
T02TD1796E:8b-12: bdud rtsi'i 'khyil pa dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1796E:8b-13: zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar //
T02TD1796E:8b-14: zhal gdangs pa ni rnam par 'gyur /
T02TD1796E:8b-15: gsus khyim tshe zhing spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1796E:8b-17: sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1796E:8b-18: gtun shing rnams ni g-yas pa na //
T02TD1796E:8b-19: sdigs mdzub zhags par bcas pa dang //
T02TD1796E:8b-20: dril bu dgra sta g-yon na bsnams //
T02TD1796E:8b-21: g-yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis //
T02TD1796E:8b-22: padma nyi ma mnan nas ni //
T02TD1796E:8b-23: byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1796E:8b-24: rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis //
T02TD1796E:8b-25: mi g-yo ba yang dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1796E:8b-26: spyan gsum aindra n'i la'i mdog / dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal //
T02TD1796E:8b-27: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:8b-28: zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar //
T02TD1796E:8b-29: mi bzad ha ha zhes bzhad sgra //
T02TD1796E:8b-30: gsus khyim che zhing stobs po che //
T02TD1796E:8b-31: ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo rnams //
T02TD1796E:8b-32: g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:8b-33: sdigs mdzub dang ni dgra sta dang //
T02TD1796E:8b-34: zhags pa g-yon pa'i phyag na bsnams //
T02TD1796E:8b-36: g-yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis //
T02TD1796E:8b-37: padma nyi ma la gnas nas //
T02TD1796E:8b-38: shar lho mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1796E:8b-39: rang gis nags kyis bskyed pa yi //
T02TD1796E:8b-40: brtul zhugs can gyis 'dod rgyal dbyung //
T02TD1796E:8b-41: drag po aindra n'a la'i mdog / rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1796E:8b-42: zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar //
T02TD1796E:8b-43: spyan gsum mche ba 'jigs su rung //
T02TD1796E:8b-44: phyag gnyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyang //
T02TD1796E:8b-45: phyag rgya dag ni 'ching bar mdzad //
T02TD1796E:8b-46: rdo rje ral gri g-yas dag na //
T02TD1796E:8b-47: g-yon na zhags pa lcags kyu'o //
T02TD1796E:9a-1: brkyang gnas pas nyi mar bzhugs //
T02TD1796E:9a-2: rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi //
T02TD1796E:9a-3: brtul zhugs can gyis dbyug sngon bskyed //
T02TD1796E:9a-4: spyan gsum sprin sngon lta bu ste //
T02TD1796E:9a-5: 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1796E:9a-6: zhal ni sngo dang dkar dang dmar //
T02TD1796E:9a-7: gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:9a-8: dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1796E:9a-9: g-yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:9a-10: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1796E:9a-11: dgra sta rnams ni g-yon na bsnams //
T02TD1796E:9a-12: yams kyi 'jigs pa bsal nas ni //
T02TD1796E:9a-13: gtum po g-yon brkyang gnas pa yis //
T02TD1796E:9a-14: padma nyi ma la gnas te //
T02TD1796E:9a-15: nub byang mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1796E:9a-16: rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi //
T02TD1796E:9a-17: rnga sgra yis ni dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1796E:9a-18: stobs po che ni sngags pas dbyung //
T02TD1796E:9a-20: zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar //
T02TD1796E:9a-21: spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sgra dang ldan //
T02TD1796E:9a-22: yan lag thams cad sprul gyis brgyan //
T02TD1796E:9a-23: gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs par byed //
T02TD1796E:9a-24: dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1796E:9a-25: g-yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:9a-26: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1796E:9a-27: dgra sta rnams ni g-yon na bsnams //
T02TD1796E:9a-28: g-yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis //
T02TD1796E:9a-30: padma nyi ma la gnas te //
T02TD1796E:9a-31: byang shar mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1796E:9a-32: rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi //
T02TD1796E:9a-33: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dbyung //
T02TD1796E:9a-34: mkha' ltar sngo bsangs 'jigs pa po //
T02TD1796E:9a-35: mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas //
T02TD1796E:9a-36: zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar //
T02TD1796E:9a-37: gtso bo spyan gsum gsus pa 'phyang //
T02TD1796E:9a-38: g-yas g-yon gnyis kyi phyag gnyis kyis //
T02TD1796E:9a-39: spyi bor gtsug tor 'dzin par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:9a-40: rdo rje padma g-yas dag dag na //
T02TD1796E:9a-41: sdigs mdzub ral gri g-yon na bsnams //
T02TD1796E:9a-43: gtum po g-yon brkyang gnas pa yis //
T02TD1796E:9a-44: padma nyi ma la gnas te //
T02TD1796E:9a-45: tshangs pa'i gnas su de bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1796E:9a-46: rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi //
T02TD1796E:9a-47: brtul zhugs can gyis gnod mdzes dbyung //
T02TD1796E:9a-48: spyan gsum nam mkha' lta bu'i mdog /
T02TD1796E:9b-0: @9b zhal ni gang dang dmar dang dkar //
T02TD1796E:9b-1: gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs pa'i zhal //
T02TD1796E:9b-2: mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas //
T02TD1796E:9b-3: rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen ni //
T02TD1796E:9b-4: g-yas pa'i phyag na 'dzin par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:9b-5: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1796E:9b-6: padma ral gri g-yon na bsnams //
T02TD1796E:9b-7: rgyu ba dang ni gnas pa'i dug / ka la ku ta sogs kun dang //
T02TD1796E:9b-8: bgegs kyi bdag po kun bcom ste //
T02TD1796E:9b-9: thams cad zhi bar mdzad nas ni //
T02TD1796E:9b-10: ma lus bka' ni rdzogs byas la //
T02TD1796E:9b-11: g-yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis //
T02TD1796E:9b-12: padma nyi ma la gnas te //
T02TD1796E:9b-13: sa yi 'og tu de bzhugs so //
T02TD1796E:9b-14: lha ni sum cu gnyis rang bzhin //
T02TD1796E:9b-15: dkyil 'khor thams cad bskyed nas ni //
T02TD1796E:9b-16: 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas gyur na //
T02TD1796E:9b-17: de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam //
T02TD1796E:9b-18: sna yi rtse mer yungs kar bsam //
T02TD1796E:9b-20: gsang ba'i sngags kyis brtags pa yi //
T02TD1796E:9b-21: ye shes mchog gi gnas bsgom mo //
T02TD1796E:9b-22: rin chen kha dog sna lnga la //
T02TD1796E:9b-23: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //
T02TD1796E:9b-24: sna yi rtse mor nan tan du //
T02TD1796E:9b-25: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom //
T02TD1796E:9b-26: rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro //
T02TD1796E:9b-27: brtan par ma gyur de mi spro //
T02TD1796E:9b-29: rab mchog sprin ni spro bar bya //
T02TD1796E:9b-30: slong mi za zhing mi bzlas te //
T02TD1796E:9b-31: ma bslangs pa la'ang chags mi bya //
T02TD1796E:9b-32: 'dod pa kun las longs spyod cing //
T02TD1796E:9b-33: sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas //
T02TD1796E:9b-34: brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni //
T02TD1796E:9b-35: rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1796E:9b-36: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1796E:9b-37: don dam pa yi bzlas par bshad //
T02TD1796E:9b-38: phra mo'i rnal 'byor bzlas pa yang //
T02TD1796E:9b-39: ci 'dod par ni rnam gnyis bya //
T02TD1796E:9b-40: slar yang sngags pas bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1796E:9b-41: de bzhin nyid la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1796E:9b-42: de nas dkyil 'khor ka nas pa 'di //
T02TD1796E:9b-43: lha mos bdag po mthong bas //
T02TD1796E:9b-44: tshigs su bcad pa 'di bzhi yis //
T02TD1796E:9b-45: bde ba chen po skul bar byed //
T02TD1796E:9b-46: sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs //
T02TD1796E:9b-47: dga' ba yi 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
T02TD1796E:9b-48: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1796E:10a-1: mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1796E:10a-2: rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan //
T02TD1796E:10a-3: sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog bsgrub rab tu phan par gzigs //
T02TD1796E:10a-4: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1796E:10a-5: 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1796E:10a-6: khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba //
T02TD1796E:10a-7: 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson //
T02TD1796E:10a-8: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1796E:10a-9: spyod pa dri med kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1796E:10a-10: khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs te dam tshig mchog gi phan don che //
T02TD1796E:10a-11: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa //
T02TD1796E:10a-12: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1796E:10a-13: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1796E:10a-14: de ltar yang dag yon tan ni //
T02TD1796E:10a-15: brjod pas mgon po de bskul nas //
T02TD1796E:10a-16: mi bskyod la sogs ngo bo yis //
T02TD1796E:10a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa bstod par mdzad //
T02TD1796E:10a-18: mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje che //
T02TD1796E:10a-19: rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po //
T02TD1796E:10a-20: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02TD1796E:10a-21: gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1796E:10a-22: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag / rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02TD1796E:10a-23: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog / ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1796E:10a-24: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02TD1796E:10a-25: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med ;
T02TD1796E:10a-26: / dngos nyid dag pa gos med pa //
T02TD1796E:10a-27: gsang ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1796E:10a-29: mi rtog nam mkha'i rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1796E:10a-30: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02TD1796E:10a-32: rdo rje dga' ba gdon mi za //
T02TD1796E:10a-33: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD1796E:10a-34: sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung //
T02TD1796E:10a-35: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1796E:10a-36: de nas 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyis bstod gsol //
T02TD1796E:10a-37: mchog tu gsang ba ji bzhin don spyad nas //
T02TD1796E:10a-38: rang gi 'khor lo la ni 'khor lo gzhug / mgon po bde ba chen po gcig po bzhugs /
T02TD1796E:10b-0: @10b de ltar rnal 'byor bzhi byed rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1796E:10b-1: h'um gi snying pos 'jig rten rab tu bsgom //
T02TD1796E:10b-2: de byung 'gro kun rdo rje sems dpar bsam //
T02TD1796E:10b-3: langs nas 'gro la bltas te ji bzhin spyad par bya //
T02TD1796E:10b-4: sngags pas ting 'dzin dmigs pa'i tshe //
T02TD1796E:10b-5: gang tshe lus ni bskams gyur na //
T02TD1796E:10b-6: lus ngag yid ni tshim byed pa'i //
T02TD1796E:10b-7: sbyor ba 'di ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1796E:10b-8: mtho gang tsam gyis dpags pa ru //
T02TD1796E:10b-9: spyi bor dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1796E:10b-10: bdud rtsi lnga ni nges 'bebs pa'i //
T02TD1796E:10b-11: aom ni de ru bas mkhar bya //
T02TD1796E:10b-12: rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02TD1796E:10b-13: skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur //
T02TD1796E:10b-14: lus ngag yid ni bde ba dag / thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
T02TD1796E:10b-15: de ltar slob pa'i sngags pa yis //
T02TD1796E:10b-16: sbyangs dang de bzhin rtogs par bya //
T02TD1796E:10b-17: lkog ma snying ga legs sbyangs shing //
T02TD1796E:10b-18: de bzhin gshegs rnams tshim par bya //
T02TD1796E:10b-19: h'um gis legs par sbyangs byas la //
T02TD1796E:10b-20: yi ge a'a: yis rtogs byas te //
T02TD1796E:10b-21: aom gyis mnan nas sbar bar bya //
T02TD1796E:10b-22: 'di ni kha zas sbyang bya ba'o //
T02TD1796E:10b-23: dang po mgrin pa'i mtshams bsam pa //
T02TD1796E:10b-24: der ni hr'i: las byung ba yi //
T02TD1796E:10b-26: lte ba'i nang du yi ge h'um //
T02TD1796E:10b-27: h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje che //
T02TD1796E:10b-28: rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsam //
T02TD1796E:10b-29: rtse mo dbus ma'i steng du ni //
T02TD1796E:10b-30: aom bsam lkog ma sbyang ba'o //
T02TD1796E:10b-31: sprin gyi sgra ni snying gar bsam //
T02TD1796E:10b-32: rtse gsum me ni de la spro //
T02TD1796E:10b-33: der ni bza' ba bsreg pa dag /'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg yin //
T02TD1796E:10b-34: rlung gis me ni sbar byed pa //
T02TD1796E:10b-35: der ni tshu gang 'tshed par byed //
T02TD1796E:10b-36: dbang chen dkyil 'khor gnas su ni //
T02TD1796E:10b-37: gang du me ni rgyu ba dag / bza' ba dang ni btung ba rnams //
T02TD1796E:10b-38: gang ci rung ba chu'i dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1796E:10b-39: bza' ba kha yi padma las //
T02TD1796E:10b-40: snying ga'i padmar yang dag gzhug / lte ba'i dkyil 'khor phyin 'og tu //
T02TD1796E:10b-41: kha sbyar ba yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1796E:10b-42: gsang ba'i padma las byung ba //
T02TD1796E:10b-43: thal pa'i mthar ni rnam par brtag / rims nad med cing nad kyang med //
T02TD1796E:10b-44: dug la sogs pas mi 'chi la //
T02TD1796E:10b-47: rdo rje phreng ba dpal mchog srub shing gis //
T02TD1796E:10b-48: gsang 'dus sbas chu'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las //
T02TD1796E:11a-1: lag bdud rtsi gang thob des //
T02TD1796E:11a-2: 'jig rten ma lus 'chi med myur thob shog / sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1796E:11a-4: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya shraddh'a ka ra warma dang /
T02TD1796E:11a-5: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
